children.value: Input box component for search scenarios.
is used to control the text in the search box, and
can customize the external background color of the search box.

props.code: <z-search v-model="value" placeholder="请输入搜索关键词" />

import { ref } from 'vue';
const value = ref('');

children.value: event is triggered after clicking the search/enter button on the keyboard, and the
event is triggered when the cancel button on the right side of the search box is clicked.

props.code:
<z-search
v-model="value"
show-action
placeholder="Please enter search keywords"
@search="onSearch"
@cancel="onCancel"
/>

children.value: Set the alignment of the search box content through the

props.code:
<z-search
v-model="value"
placeholder="Please enter search keywords"
input-align="center"
/>

children.value: Disable the search box via the

props.code: <z-search v-model="value" disabled placeholder="请输入搜索关键词" />

children.value: The background color outside the search box can be set through the
attribute, and the shape of the search box can be set through the

props.code:
<z-search
v-model="value"
shape="round"
background="#4fc08d"
placeholder="Please enter search keywords"
/>

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
